case.title: Searching for that special girl - 24 (Bronx New York)
case.text: Hi im Orlando im nice and im a sweetheart once u get 2 kno me i like to hang out wit my friends n go 2 the movies n have a good time n lookin tht special girl ikno she's out there :) I love playin video games my all time favorite is Mario I like everything that has to do wit nintendo p.s. i really hope i find that special girl hope to hear from u :)
